pr_title: [#10397] Create API for receiving all responses of a feedback question

timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText: Can we inherit the doc for deleteFeedbackResponsesForQuestion in feedbackResponsesLogic
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText:
I don't recommend to use map as API request. It is too abstract and there is no way to tell the structure immediately even looking at the class itself.
Instead, I think it should accept a list of FeedbackResponseRequest where there are two field recipientIdentifier  and responseDetails.
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText:
The above lines can be written as
FeedbackResponseAttributes.UpdateOptions options = XXXX (Line 148 - 154)
FeedbackResponseAttributes updatedResponse = new FeedbackResponseAttributes(feedbackResponse);
updatedResponse.update(options)
feedbackResponsesToValidate.add(updatedResponse)
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText: Why we need set the ID manually? The ID should be updated correctly in the returned response. I believe the previous API is written before my improvement on DB layer.
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.message: Add more rounding off and change modulo operator
Add more rounding off and change modulo operator
Move question type-specific response validation to QuestionDetails class
Add logic method to delete all feedback responses for a question
Unify API to submit session response per question
Add question-wide validation for constsum and rank recipient
Edit front-end to use new API endpoint structure
Display only points per recipient for constsum recipient additional info
Add more rounding off and change modulo operator
Add more rounding off and change modulo operator
